Title: Santheyalli Nintha Kabira
Writer: Bheeshma Sahani (story), Narendra Babu (screenplay), Gopal Wajapeyi (dialogue), Gopal Wajapeyi (lyricist)
Actors: Shivarajkumar, Sanusha, Sharath Kumar, H.G. Dattatreya
Plot: Kabira, an orphan, is raised in the house of poor Muslim weavers. He's different from the rest of his lot because of his peaceful demeanour, which allows him to question religion and practices.
